name: The Tale of the ADHD Dinosaur
name_original: The Tale of the ADHD Dinosaur
description:
A short game where you play a dinosaur with severe ADHD, but none of the NPCs relate.

Learn more about ADHD.

Asset Credits

  • Pixel art crown by Centuria Game Dev
  • Froots n' veggies by zrghr
  • Dino characters by arks
  • Retro Computer font by Petyka
  • Sound effects, UI & platformer tiles by Kenney
  • Sunny land tiles and backgrounds by Ansimuz
  • Tomb Opening Sound by AV Productions
